Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav cracked a 28-ball 53 to set India up for a convincing 47-run win over Afghanistan.
Jasprit Bumrah claimed three for seven.
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav was named the player of the match for his fifty.
India's win was comfortable, and Afghanistan's run-rate was negatively impacted for their upcoming games against Bangladesh and Australia.
